## Group members

We have over 40 members, including from:

* [Jean Golding Institute](https://www.bristol.ac.uk/golding/)
* [Bristol Centre for Supercomputing (BriCS)](https://isambard.ac.uk/)
* [IT Services](https://www.bristol.ac.uk/it-services/), including the [Advanced Computing Research Centre](https://www.bristol.ac.uk/acrc/) and [Research IT](https://www.bristol.ac.uk/research-it/)
* [LEAP Digital Health Hub](https://leap-hub.ac.uk/)
* [Atmospheric Chemistry Research Group (ACRG)](https://www.bristol.ac.uk/chemistry/research/acrg/)
* [Bristol Composites Institute](https://www.bristol.ac.uk/composites/)
* and other embedded researchers across the University.
